document_data.name: Parandur Delcastle
document_data.mainbody: '''Parandur Delcastle''' was a head of House [[Delcastle]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Parandur Delcastle drank himself into a stupor daily as of {{yearlink|1479}}.
document_data.Relationships: By {{yearlink|1479}}, Parandur had grown distant from his wife [[Marantine Delcastle]] and son [[Arclath Delcastle]], having been driven to drink.
document_data.History: Parandur's house, the Delcastle nobility, was represented by [[Mirt]] in the royal banquet of {{yearlink|1479}}.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|383|36}}
